entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 09:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -21.2°C
Wind: WNW 35 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning late this morning. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm along parts of the coast. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
